Address: 2303 DULLES STATION BOULEVARD, HERNDON, Virginia, 20171, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Strategic Education, Inc., a Maryland corporation formerly known as Strayer Education, Inc., is an education services company that seeks to provide the most direct path between learning and employment through campus-based and online post-secondary education offerings, as well as through programs to develop job-ready skills for high-demand markets. The Company conducts its operations primarily through its wholly-owned subsidiaries, Strayer University and Capella University, both accredited post-secondary institutions of higher education. The Company's operations also include certain non-degree programs, mainly focused on software and application development. The Company generated net revenue of $997 million in 2019.  ... More ...
